channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: In US, the Iranian diaspora contends with the Israel-Iran war and a fragile ceasefire
item.description: The fast-changing war between Israel and Iran, which the U.S. recently inserted itself in by targeting Iran’s nuclear sites, has caused a mix of emotions among many in the Iranian diaspora in America.

item.title: Zohran Mamdani declares victory in NYC’s Democratic mayoral primary as Cuomo concedes
Astronauts from India, Poland and Hungary blast off on a privately funded trip to the space station
